RelativeLayout:
<TextView android:id="@+id/firstText" android:layout_margin="15dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_below="@id/text" android:text="Say <> - the car will move forwards for a distance equal to @number@ in centimeters"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/secondText" android:layout_margin="15dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_below="@id/firstText" android:text="Say <> - the car will move backwards for a distance equal to @number@ in centimeters"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/thirdText" android:layout_margin="15dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_below="@id/secondText" android:text="Say <> - the car will rotate 15 degrees clockwise"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/forthText" android:layout_margin="15dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_below="@id/thirdText" android:text="Say <> - the car will rotate 15 degrees counter clockwise"/>
